title: T210 Orange Borders in REA Spring Auction 2017
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: T210 Orange Borders in REA Spring Auction 2017
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following 13 Orange Border T210-3 cards available for trade/sale. Prices include delivery.Thanks guys.

Alexander SGC 10 
Billiard SGC 40
Blanding SGC 30 
Curry SGC 30 
Firestine SGC 10 
Gordon SGC 30
Hooks SGC 10
Johnston SGC 45
Kipp SGC 30 
Leidy SGC 20 
Nagel SGC A 
Slaven SGC 10
Stinson SGC 10 


I have included my current want list which would help me complete Series 4,5, and 7. The Series 2 cards listed are upgrades im looking for with the assigned grade needd listed. Raw, SGC, or PSA are good with me as long as they grade/are graded at or above the number. Scans of the OB's are available upon request just send me your email. Thank you and I hope to make a few fair trades with the community.

Bump. Im still looking to trade if anyone is interested in adding an OB or two to there collection. Happy Sunday everyone.
I thought I would give this trade thread one more shot. 6 OB's are off to SGC so the available list for now stands at 8. Thanks guys.

[quote name="benderbroeth" post=1585877]are any of yours series 4?[/QUOTE]

The orange border cards are only found in Series 3.

I have always heard of possible Orange Borders in other Series but have yet to come across one. A few Salmon colored which I believe is the first shade in the process of the ink running out that leads to the Orange coloration if that makes sense.

Also I just lowered the prices a bit if anyone has interest in adding a OB type card. Thank you everyone.
All cards have been graded now and listed in the op. Last bump on here then ill look into other ways to move this duplicate set. Thank you offers welcomed.
